metadata.title: CVE-2017-12104 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the way that the Blenderopen-source 3d creation suite v2.78c draws a Particle object. A speciallycrafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a bufferoverflow which can allow for code execution under the context of theapplication. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use thefile as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
